alert.note: Alert for Bannock (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 7:18PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Idaho... Marsh Creek near McCammon affecting Bannock County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor Flooding is occurring. Downata Hot Springs Road near Marsh Creek is flooded. * WHERE...Marsh Creek near McCammon. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Near bankfull from Downata Hot Springs to the confluence of the Portneuf River. Isolated areas of lowland flooding possible along with ponding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 4.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 5.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
